title: Bitcoin Hits $1 Trillion Market Cap as BTC Blitzes Past $51K
description: More bullish signs: Bitcoin open interest is the highest it's been in 2 years and the iShares Bitcoin Trust now holds more than 100,000 BTC.

title: Bitcoin bulls flirt with $69K BTC price target as crypto market nears $2T
description:
BTC price seems unstoppable even pre-Wall Street as the highest levels since late 2021 greet Bitcoin bears.

Bitcoin (BTC) hit new two-year highs on Feb. 14 as bulls enjoyed a Valentine’s Day surprise. 

Data from Cointelegraph Markets Pro and TradingView tracked a powerful BTC price comeback from $48,400 lows the day prior.

During the Asia session, Bitcoin not only erased its snap 4% losses but added to long-term highs and was on course for $52,000 at the time of writing.

Read more

title: Solana surpasses BNB Chain as fourth-largest digital asset by market cap
description:
Solana’s SOL has surged past Binance-backed BNB in the last 24 hours, securing its position as the fourth-largest digital asset by market capitalization. Data from CryptoSlate showed that SOL’s market cap is wavering around $50 billion, marking its first foray past this threshold since December. In contrast, BNB’s market cap peaked at $49.2 billion during […]

The post Solana surpasses BNB Chain as fourth-largest digital asset by market cap appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Bitcoin hits $1 trillion market cap again as $217 million liquidated in 24 hours
description:
Quick Take Currently, Bitcoin’s value is around $51,500, successfully surpassing the $1 trillion market cap. This ascension places it above some of the world’s leading corporations. Berkshire Hathaway’s market cap hovers around $850 billion, marking it the eleventh-largest entity. Meanwhile, Meta, standing ninth in the global ranking, carries a market cap of $1.173 trillion. Bitcoin […]

title: Robinhood reports 10% revenue increase amid crypto market expansion
description: In a recent financial disclosure, Robinhood announced a significant 10% increase in revenue, reaching $43 million. This growth is attributed to a surge in user engagement and trading volumes on the platform. The revenue increase underscores Robinhood’s expanding influence in the cryptocurrency market and sets the stage for heightened speculation regarding its competitive stance against […]

title: Alleged crypto scandal rocks South Korean entertainment industry
description: A recent allegation of a crypto scandal has sent shockwaves through the South Korean entertainment industry, implicating an important blockchain platform in the country. Local reports indicate that Winnerz, a Korean blockchain sports platform, is accused of fraud, including running a coin scam and obstructing investors from accessing their funds. title: Treasury report highlights increased use of Bitcoin in trafficking and exploitation crimes
description: The U.S. Department of the Treasury’s Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (FinCEN) released a trend report on Tuesday, shedding light on the growing utilization of Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies in illicit activities, particularly in human trafficking and the sexual exploitation of children.  Based on data from financial firms’ government filings in 2020 and 2021, the report […]

title: Hedera and Seaplify: Revolutionizing Maritime Employment with DLT
description: Hedera and Seaplify just partnered to resolve workforce shortage challenges in the Maritime sector. The real-world solution being championed has driven an uptick in HBAR. title: Bitcoin Bulls Strike: Traders Bet Big with Options at $65K and Beyond
description: Bitcoin traders are bullish on the crypto, with call options at strike prices of $60,000 and above dominating the market ahead of the end-month expiry on Feb. 23. title: Polygon PoS Bridge Leads with Record $80M Volume
description:

description:

title: ‘Pent-Up Demand’ Driving Surge of Capital Into Bitcoin (BTC), According to MicroStrategy Founder Michael Saylor
description:
The founder and executive chairman of enterprise software firm MicroStrategy says that the demand for Bitcoin (BTC) is outstripping its supply. In a new interview on CNBC Television, BTC firebrand Michael Saylor says that the approval of spot market Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) in the US has triggered massive demand for the flagship digital asset.
